DOC.detailed_description: Methylphenidate ( MPH ) commonly use treat individual diagnose ADHD . The purpose study determine effectiveness MPH treat adult cocaine dependent individual also diagnose ADHD . Participants 14-week , double-blind , placebo-controlled study randomly assign receive either sustained-release MPH placebo . All participant receive individual cognitive behavioral therapy . The trial last 14 week . It include 1-week placebo lead-in phase 2-week dose titration phase , follow 11 week stable dose MPH . During titration phase , MPH give twice day , start dose 10 mg/day . The dose increase 10 mg day , final stable dose 40 mg/day reach . At time , sustained-release MPH give two 20 mg dos ( one morning one afternoon ) . Depending participant 's tolerance MPH , dose increase maximum 60 mg/day ( 40 mg morning 20 mg afternoon ) . Participants unable tolerate dose least 40 mg/day MPH discontinue study . Assessments ADHD symptom complete weekly study visit . In addition , drug use assessment also complete include self-reports urine toxicology test .
